text: Sociedad Deportiva Textil Escudo is a football team based in Cabezón de la Sal in the autonomous community of Cantabria. Founded in 1925, the team plays in the Tercera División – Group 3. The club's home ground is Campo de Fútbol Juan María Parés Serra, which has a capacity of 1,500 spectators. == Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Tier !Division !Place !Copa del Rey |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1949–80 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1980/81 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Reg.
